Odyssey.Notes: With transmission fluid and power-steering fluid coolers and two occupants. Deduct 150 pounds per passenger, up to seven passengers; Without transmission fluid/power-steering fluid coolers: 2000 lbs maximum with two occupants.

Pilot.Notes: With transmission fluid and power-steering fluid coolers and two occupants. Deduct 150 pounds per passenger, up to seven passengers; Without transmission fluid/power-steering fluid coolers: 2000 lbs maximum with two occupants.
